body: The shadow over her face is supposed to be for portraying her with a dark demeanor, it's for giving off the impression that she is disturbed or is unhappy.

I think it's the artist's way to show that she's shady. But too much does feels like she always puts on heavy make-up on her face. But at least I welcome another yandere hentai. They're so lacking these days. I want more yandere stories!!!
Is she blind or just wear eye mask all day or just artist failed attempt to draw eye shadow, i dont get it at all.
